name: CheeseLand RTS
description:
Fight Cheese on a cheesy world!

Use WASD or ARROW KEYS to move the camera

SHIFT AND SCROLL WHEEL to zoom in and out.

CLICK units to select them, hold SHIFT when selecting to select multiple units

Use SCROLL WHEEL or NUMBER KEYS to change selected hot bar slot - 1 is for commanding units and 3 is for placing towers that cost 12 Cheese.

Press 1 to spawn more units at a cost of 2 money.

Command player units to fight and gather cheese, conquer the green capture point for money.
